languages.text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased by +2.
languages.original_text: Атаки с помощью выбранного дистанционного оружия получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шансу попадания{/g}. Их {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g} увеличиваются на 2 и 2% соответственно.

traits.locale_text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to hit chance. Its damage and armour penetration are increased by +2.

languages.text: 使用选定的远程武器进行攻击时，获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}加值。此武器的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}获得+2加值。

languages.text: Los ataques con el arma a distancia elegida reciben una bonificación de +20 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g}. Su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} se incrementan en +2.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques con el arma {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} elegida reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g}. Su daño y {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} se incrementan en +2.

languages.text: Angriffe mit der ausgewählten Fernkampfwaffe erhalten einen Bonus von +20 % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} erhöhen sich um +2.
languages.original_text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased by +2.

traits.locale_text: Angriffe mit der ausgewählten {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffe{/g} erhalten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20 % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}. Ihr Schaden und ihre {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} erhöhen sich um +2.

languages.text: Un bonus de +20 % s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} lors des attaques menées avec l'arme à distance. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de cette arme augmentent de +2.
languages.original_text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased by +2.

traits.locale_text: Un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +20 % s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} lors des attaques menées avec l'arme {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Les dégâts et la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de cette arme augmentent de +2.

languages.text: 選択した遠隔武器での攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に+20%のボーナスを得る。その{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+2増加する。
languages.original_text: Attacks with the chosen ranged weapon gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased by +2.

traits.locale_text: 選択した遠隔武器での攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に+20%のボーナスを得る。その{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+2増加する。

選択した{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔武器{/g}での攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}に+20%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。その{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+2増加する。

languages.text: Seçilen menzilli silahla yapılan saldırılar, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılıklarına{/g} +%20 bonus kazanırlar. Saldırıların vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri +2 artar.
